00005 #include <fstream>

00044 class ResultsContainer {
00045 
00047     std::string* datasetNames;
00048 
00050     float** results;
00051 
00053     int numberOfDatasets;
00054 
00056     int capacity;
00057 
00059     static const int MIN_CAPACITY = 100;
00060 
00062     static const int INC_CAPACITY = 100;
00063 
00064 public:
00065 
00067     ResultsContainer () {
00068     
00069         numberOfDatasets = 0;
00070         capacity         = MIN_CAPACITY;
00071         datasetNames     = new std::string [ MIN_CAPACITY ];
00072         results          = new float* [ MIN_CAPACITY ];
00073 
00074         for ( int i = 0; i < MIN_CAPACITY; i++ ) {
00075             results[i] = 0;
00076         }
00077         
00078     } // end ResultsContainer
00079 
00081     ~ResultsContainer () {
00082 
00083         int i;
00084 
00085         for ( i = 0; i < numberOfDatasets; i++ ) {
00086             delete [] results[i];
00087         }
00088 
00089         delete [] datasetNames;
00090         delete [] results;
00091         
00092     } // end ~ResultsContainer
00093 
00099     void addElement ( std::string datasetName, float* elem ) {
00100 
00101         int i;
00102 
00103         if ( numberOfDatasets >= capacity ) {
00104             std::string* newDatasetNames = new std::string [ capacity + INC_CAPACITY ];
00105             float** newResults      = new float* [ capacity + INC_CAPACITY ];
00106             
00107             for ( i = 0; i < capacity; i++ ) {
00108                 newDatasetNames[i] = datasetNames[i];
00109                 newResults[i]      = results[i];
00110             }
00111 
00112             capacity += INC_CAPACITY;
00113 
00114             delete [] datasetNames;
00115             delete [] results;
00116 
00117             datasetNames = newDatasetNames;
00118             results      = newResults;
00119         }
00120 
00121         datasetNames[ numberOfDatasets ] = datasetName;
00122         results[ numberOfDatasets ] = elem;
00123         numberOfDatasets ++;
00124         
00125     } // end addElement
00126 
00132     float* getResult ( int position ) {
00133 
00134         if ( position >= 0 && position < capacity ) {
00135             return results[ position ];
00136         }
00137 
00138         return 0;
00139 
00140     } // end getResult
00141 
00147     std::string getDatasetName ( int position ) {
00148 
00149         if ( position >= 0 && position < capacity ) {
00150             return datasetNames[ position ];
00151         }
00152 
00153         return "";
00154 
00155     } // end getDatasetName
00156 
00163     std::string getShortDatasetName ( int position, int maxSize ) {
00164 
00165         std::string shortName = datasetNames[ position ];
00166         int i, index;
00167         const int initialPositions = 4;
00168 
00169         index =  maxSize / 2 ;
00170 
00171         if ( position >= 0 && position < capacity ) {
00172             if ( datasetNames[ position ].size () >= ( unsigned int ) maxSize ) {
00173                 shortName.erase ( initialPositions, datasetNames[ position ].size () - maxSize + initialPositions - 1 );
00174                 shortName.insert ( initialPositions, ".." );
00175             }
00176             else { // Build a name of 30 characters.
00177                 if ( datasetNames[ position ].size () < ( unsigned int ) maxSize ) {
00178                     for ( i = 0; i < abs ( maxSize - datasetNames[ position ].size () ) - 1; i++ ) {
00179                         shortName += " ";
00180                     }
00181                 }
00182             }
00183         }
00184 
00185         return shortName;
00186 
00187     } // end getShortDatasetName
00188 
00193     int getNumberOfDatasets () {
00194         return numberOfDatasets;
00195     } // end getNumberOfDatasets
00196 
00197 };
